page.title: 06HOME LIFE
page.content: {"Saturday"} by Hannah Cleveland. The family gets up at about 8.45 and once they have had a wash and got dressed we all go downstairs and have breakfast which is cereals and toast. We go shopping next and buy all the food for the week,and then go into a cafe for a drink and snack.When we get back we have a sandwich and watch the sport on T.V. In the afternoon after the house work we go for a walk down the canal and see the boats coming through the locks. When we get back it is time for tea which is fish and chips from the chip shop, with apple pie to follow. After tea we all sit in front of the T.V. which we watch until we play cards.After that we go to bed and get to sleep if we can!
